UFuncs
=======

:code:`Ufuncs` are element-wise functions that accept a single
:py:data:`xtensors.TensorLike` object and return an :py:class:`xtensors.XTensor`.


.. autofunction:: xtensors.sigmoid

.. autofunction:: xtensors.exp

.. autofunction:: xtensors.log2

.. autofunction:: xtensors.log

.. autofunction:: xtensors.log10

.. autofunction:: xtensors.cos

.. autofunction:: xtensors.sin

.. autofunction:: xtensors.tan

.. autofunction:: xtensors.cosh

.. autofunction:: xtensors.sinh

.. autofunction:: xtensors.tanh
